Houari Manar (Arabic; 18 Disemba 1981 〜 7 Jenụwarị 2019) bụ onye Algeria na-agụ egwú raï nke a ma ama n'ala nna ya yana mba ndị gbara ya gburugburu Maghreb na mba Mediterenian, na France.
A mụrụ Houari Manar na Houari El Madani na Oran n'ezinụlọ nwere ụmụnne nwoke na ụmụnne nwanyị iri na abụọ
Nne ya bụ onye na-agụ egwú meddahate a ma ama; onye na-eme egwú ọdịnala na ememme na agbamakwụkwọ
Abụọ n'ime ụmụnne ya, Cheb Massaro na Cheb Larbi, bụkwa ndị na-agụ egwụ raï
Ezinụlọ ahụ kwagara Marseille, France, mgbe ọ dị afọ anọ. N'oge ọ bụ nwata, ndị na-agụ egwú dịka Celine Dion, Mariah Carey, na Francis Cabrel kpaliri ya.

N'afọ pụkụ abụọ na atọ 2003, Manar laghachiri Algeria iji malite ọrụ dị ka onye na-agụ egwụ raï; ụdị egwu ọdịnala Algeria nke malitere na 1920. O dekọrọ egwu abụọ na-aga nke ọma, "Cha dani bent nass" na "Kima ndirlek ma terdhach" na akara Edition Saint Crépain
N'afọ 2006, o dekọrọ abọm mbụ ya Aâchkek mon traitement na Cheb Kader
Abọm ahụ bụ ngwakọta nke raï na egwu pop nke oge a.
Manar ghọrọ onye a ma ama n'ọtụtụ Mediterenian ma kpatara esemokwu n'oge ọrụ ya.

? N'afọ 2014, n'oge ọnwa nsọ nke ndị Alakụba nke Ramadan, e sere ya foto ka ọ na-esusu nwoke ọzọ ọnụ n'ebe egwu dị na Algiers ebe ọ na-eme ihe, na-ewe ndị okpukpe iwe. Onye na-ahazi egwu ahụ ga-arịọ ndị iwe were mgbaghara ma kagbuo arụmọrụ Manar

Ọrụ Manar nọgidere na-ata ahụhụ site na mmeghachi omume megide àgwà ya na-egbuke egbuke na ndina ụdị onwe na-ekpuchi ekpuchi. N'afọ 2017, ọ ga-eme ihe omume nke National Office of Culture and Information haziri iji mee emume ncheta afọ iri isii na atọ nke mmalite nke Agha Nnwere Onwe Algeria

Mgbe a tọhapụrụ akụkọ banyere òkè ya, arụmụka ọhụrụ na mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta zutere arụmọrụ ya na-abịanụ ma mesịa wepụ ya na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri. E mechara machibido ya iwu ime ihe nkiri na ụlọ ọrụ telivishọn nke steeti na nke onwe ya na Algeria.

Ọ bụ ezie na ụfọdụ n'ime abụ ya zoro aka n'ụzọ siri ike na nwoke idina nwoke, Manar apụtaghị n'ihu ọha dị ka nwoke idina nwanyị (ọ bụ ezie na ọ dịghị mgbe ọ na-agọnahụ ya) ma gbachitere onwe ya pụọ n'aka ndị nkatọ, na-agwa Monde na 2015, "My raï bụ ezigbo raï. Ihe niile m na-abụ abụ m na-agụ n'ihu ezinụlọ, ụmụaka na ndị agadi
Abụ m otu n'ime ndị na-abụ abụ maka okwu rụrụ arụ
Abụ m onye na-ese ihe a na-akwanyere ùgwù."
Na 7 Jenụwarị 2019, Manar nwụrụ site na nkụchi obi n'ụlọ ọgwụ onwe onye dị na Hydra mgbe ọ na-aga liposuction
Ọ dị afọ iri atọ na asaa.
